# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(new_schemecache_ut)
add_subdirectory(describes_ut)

add_executable(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut)


target_compile_options(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut PRIVATE
  -DYDB_SDK_USE_STD_STRING
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1
  library-cpp-getopt
  library-cpp-svnversion
  cpp-digest-md5
  core-testlib-default
  ydb-library-aclib
  library-persqueue-tests
  library-persqueue-topic_parser
  api-grpc
  persqueue_public-ut-ut_utils
  src-client-persqueue_public
  src-client-table
  src-client-topic
  src-client-proto
)

target_allocator(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/persqueue_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/persqueue_common_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/persqueue_compat_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/first_class_src_ids_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/topic_yql_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/rate_limiter_test_setup.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/functions_executor_wrapper.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/topic_service_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/demo_tx.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/partition_writer_cache_actor_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/pqtablet_mock.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/kqp_mock.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/partition_writer_cache_actor_fixture.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/test_utils.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/pq_data_writer.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/api_test_setup.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/rate_limiter_test_setup.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/services/persqueue_v1/ut/functions_executor_wrapper.h
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

vcs_info(ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-services-persqueue_v1-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
